title: True Lies
description: In this Dateline Classic, when Diane Kyne is found dead in her bedroom, competing stories emerge about which of the two most important men in her life may have killed her. One of the stories must be true – but which one? Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April  16, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
